name: Jurassic Snap (Demo)
description:
Controls: Z , X, Enter, Shift, Arrow Keys

(I didn't quite get to iron out the programming the way I had hoped in  the allotted time, but I still wanted to submit the game as a  proof of concept even if a lot of the mechanics are a under developed. But hope you get the idea and have fun!)

TAKE JURASSIC PHOTOS!!!

But don't be too slow about it or you may miss something...

DISCOVER LONG FORGOTTEN CREATURES!!!

You may even find ways to befriend them... or irritate them...

DO THIS ALL ON YOUR GAMEBOY COLOR!
